net.rtccloud.sdk

Interface MeetingPoint


  • public interface MeetingPoint
    Represents a MeetingPoint. Such an object is created by the SDK on StatusEvent where StatusEvent.getType() equals to StatusEvent.Type.CREATED.
    Author:
    Simon Marquis
    See Also:
    RtccEngine#createMeetingPoint(Builder), RtccEngine.getMeetingPoint(String)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MeetingPoint.Builder
      Builder used to create a MeetingPoint
      static interface  MeetingPoint.Editor
      Interface used for modifying values in a MeetingPoint object.
      static class  MeetingPoint.Mode
      Mode to apply on a MeetingPoint
      static class  MeetingPoint.State
      Internal state of a MeetingPoint
      static class  MeetingPoint.Type
      Meeting point types

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint id

      • getState

        MeetingPoint.State getState()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint state

      • getType

        MeetingPoint.Type getType()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint type

      • getMode

        MeetingPoint.Mode getMode()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint mode

      • setIsHost

        void setIsHost(boolean isHost)
        Sets the current user as host or attendee of the MeetingPoint
        Parameters:
        isHost - true to become the host, false to become the attendee

      • isHost

        boolean isHost()
        Returns:
        true if the user is the host of this MeetingPoint, false otherwise

      • isHosted

        boolean isHosted()
        Returns:
        true if the MeetingPoint is hosted, false otherwise
        See Also:
        host()

      • getTitle

        String getTitle()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint title

      • getLocation

        String getLocation()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint location

      • getStartTime

        int getStartTime()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint start time

      • getEndTime

        int getEndTime()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint end time

      • getHostUrl

        String getHostUrl()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint host url

      • getAttendeeUrl

        String getAttendeeUrl()
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint attendee url

      • edit

        MeetingPoint.Editor edit()
        Create a new Editor for this MeetingPoint, through which you can make modifications.
        You must call MeetingPoint.Editor.apply() to apply the modifications.
        Returns:
        a new instance of the MeetingPoint.Editor interface.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the user is not the host of the MeetingPoint

      • details

        void details()
        Asynchronous call
        Fetch the MeetingPoint data.

        A StatusEvent with StatusEvent.getType() equals to StatusEvent.Type.DETAILS will be fired when the MeetingPoint is updated.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the user is not the host of the MeetingPoint

      • delete

        void delete()
        Asynchronous call
        Delete the MeetingPoint.

        A StatusEvent with StatusEvent.getType() equals to StatusEvent.Type.DELETED will be fired when the MeetingPoint is deleted.

      • call

        void call()
        Asynchronous call
        Call the MeetingPoint as host or as attendee depending on the isHost() value.

        A CreatedEvent will be fired upon call creation with Call.getCallType() equals to Call.CallType.HOSTED_CONFERENCE or Call.CallType.JOINED_CONFERENCE.

      • host

        void host()
        Asynchronous call
        Host the MeetingPoint.

        A StatusEvent with StatusEvent.getType() equals to StatusEvent.Type.HOSTED will be fired when the MeetingPoint is hosted.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the user is not the host of the MeetingPoint

      • join

        void join()
        Asynchronous call
        Request to join the MeetingPoint.

        A RequestEvent with RequestEvent.getType() equals to RequestEvent.Type.ACCEPTED, RequestEvent.Type.DENIED or RequestEvent.Type.PENDING will be fired depending on the MeetingPoint MeetingPoint.Mode and the Host's actions.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the user is not an attendee of the MeetingPoint

      • accept

        void accept(String uid)
        Asynchronous call
        Accept the request to join from the corresponding contact or the invitation from the corresponding host.

        The contact will receive a RequestEvent with RequestEvent.getType() equals to RequestEvent.Type.ACCEPTED.
        Parameters:
        uid - The corresponding contact uid

      • deny

        void deny(String uid)
        Asynchronous call
        Deny the request to join from the corresponding contact or the invitation from the corresponding host.

        The contact will receive a RequestEvent with RequestEvent.getType() equals to RequestEvent.Type.DENIED.
        Parameters:
        uid - The corresponding contact uid

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Asynchronous call
        Cancel a previously sent request to join.

      • cancel

        void cancel(String uid)
        Asynchronous call
        Cancel a previously sent invitation.
        Parameters:
        uid -

      • invite

        void invite(String uid)
        Asynchronous call
        Invite the corresponding contact to the MeetingPoint.

        The contact will receive a RequestEvent with RequestEvent.getType() equals to RequestEvent.Type.INVITED.
        Parameters:
        uid - The corresponding contact uid

      • stop

        void stop()
        Asynchronous call
        Stop the MeetingPoint.

      • mode

        void mode(MeetingPoint.Mode mode)
        Asynchronous call
        Change the MeetingPoint mode.

        A LockModeEvent will be fired when the new mode is effective.
        Parameters:
        mode - The status to apply
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the user is not the host of the MeetingPoint

      • list

        void list()
        Asynchronous call
        Request the list of contacts that are still waiting for the MeetingPoint.

        A RequestEvent with RequestEvent.getType() equals to RequestEvent.Type.JOINING will be fired for each waiting contact.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the user is not the host of the MeetingPoint
        See Also:
        accept(String), deny(String)
